p.#text:
e)peidh\ to\ me\n ai)sqa/nesqai/ te kai\ kinei=sqai 
kata\ proai/resin i)/dia tw=n zw|/wn e)sti/, to\ d' 
au)ca/nesqai/ te kai\ tre/fesqai koina\ kai\ toi=s 
futoi=s, ei)/h a)\n ta\ me\n pro/tera th=s yuxh=s, ta\ de\ 
deu/tera th=s fu/sews e)/rga. ei) de/ tis kai\ toi=s 
futoi=s yuxh=s metadi/dwsi kai\ diairou/menos au)ta\s 
o)noma/zei futikh\n me\n tau/thn, ai)sqhtikh\n de\ th\n 
e(te/ran, le/gei me\n ou)d' ou(=tos a)/lla, th=| le/cei d' 
ou) pa/nu th=| sunh/qei ke/xrhtai. a)ll' h(mei=s ge 
megi/sthn le/cews a)reth\n safh/neian ei)=nai  
pepeisme/noi kai\ tau/thn ei)do/tes u(p' ou)deno\s ou(/tws 
w(s u(po\ tw=n a)sunh/qwn o)noma/twn diafqeirome/nhn, 
w(s toi=s polloi=s e)/qos, ou(/tws o)noma/zontes u(po\ me\n

au)ca/nesqai/ te kai\ tre/fesqai fu/sews e)/rga fame/n, 
ou) yuxh=s.

p:
kai\ zhth/somen kata\ to/nde to\n lo/gon, u(po\ 
ti/nwn gi/gnetai duna/mewn au)ta\ dh\ tau=ta kai\ ei)

a)lla\ pro/tero/n ge diele/sqai te xrh\ kai\ 
mhnu=sai safw=s e(/kaston tw=n o)noma/twn, oi(=s xrhso/meqa kata\ to/nde to\n lo/gon,

p.#text:
o(/tan ou)=n ti sw=ma kata\ mhde\n e)calla/tthtai 
tw=n prou+parxo/ntwn, h(suxa/zein au)to/ famen: ei) 
d' e)ci/staito/ ph|, kat' e)kei=no kinei=sqai. kai\ toi/nun 
e)pei\ polueidw=s e)ci/statai, polueidw=s kai\ kinhqh/setai. kai\ ga\r ei) leuko\n 
u(pa/rxon melai/noito

e)/mpalin e)c au)sthrou= gluku\ ge/noito, kai\ tou=t' a)\n

kai\ tou=to le/gomen, w(/sper ge kai\ ei)/ ti chro\n e)c 
 
u(grou= h)\ u(gro\n e)k chrou= gi/gnoito. koino\n de\ kata\ 
tou/twn a(pa/ntwn o)/noma fe/romen th\n a)lloi/wsin.

p:
e(/n ti tou=to ge/nos kinh/sews. e(/teron de\ ge/nos 
e)pi\ toi=s ta\s xw/ras a)mei/bousi sw/masi kai\ to/pon 
e)k to/pou metalla/ttein legome/nois, o)/noma de\ kai\ 
tou/tw| fora/.

au(=tai me\n ou)=n ai( du/o kinh/seis a(plai= kai\ 
prw=tai, su/nqetoi d' e)c au)tw=n au)/chsi/s te kai\ 
fqi/sis, o(/tan e)c e)la/ttono/s ti mei=zon h)\ e)k mei/zonos 
e)/latton ge/nhtai fula/tton to\ oi)kei=on ei)=dos. e(/terai 
de\ du/o kinh/seis ge/nesis kai\ fqora/, ge/nesis me\n h( 
ei)s ou)si/an a)gwgh/, fqora\ d' h( e)nanti/a.

p.#text:
pa/sais de\ tai=s kinh/sesi koino\n e)ca/llacis 
 
tou= prou+pa/rxontos, w(/sper ou)=n kai\ tai=s h(suxi/ais 
h( fulakh\ tw=n prou+parxo/ntwn. a)ll' o(/ti me\n 
e)calla/ttetai kai\ pro\s th\n o)/yin kai\ pro\s th\n 
geu=sin kai\ pro\s th\n a(fh\n ai(=ma gigno/mena ta\ 
siti/a, sugxwrou=sin: o(/ti de\ kai\ kat' a)lh/qeian, 
ou)ke/ti tou=q' o(mologou=sin oi( sofistai/. oi( me\n 
ga/r tines au)tw=n a(/panta ta\ toiau=ta tw=n h(mete/rwn 
ai)sqh/sewn a)pa/tas tina\s kai\ paragwga\s nomi/zousin a)/llot' a)/llws pasxousw=n, 
th=s u(pokeime/nhs ou)si/as mhde\n tou/twn, oi(=s e)ponoma/zetai, 
dexome/nhs: oi( de/ tines ei)=nai me\n e)n au)th=| bou/lontai 
ta\s poio/thtas, a)metablh/tous de\ kai\ a)tre/ptous 
 
e)c ai)w=nos ei)s ai)w=na kai\ ta\s fainome/nas tau/tas 
a)lloiw/seis th=| diakri/sei te kai\ sugkri/sei gi/gnesqai/ fasin w(s *)anacago/ras.

ei) dh\ tou/tous e)ktrapo/menos e)cele/gxoimi, mei=zon 
a)/n moi to\ pa/rergon tou= e)/rgou ge/noito. ei) me\n 
ga\r ou)k i)/sasin, o(/sa peri\ th=s kaq' o(/lhn th\n 
ou)si/an a)lloiw/sews *)aristote/lei te kai\ met' 
au)to\n *xrusi/ppw| ge/graptai, parakale/sai xrh\ 
toi=s e)kei/nwn au)tou\s o(milh=sai gra/mmasin: ei) de\ 
gignw/skontes e)/peiq' e(ko/ntes ta\ xei/rw pro\ tw=n 
 
beltio/nwn ai(rou=ntai, ma/taia dh/pou kai\ ta\ 
h(me/tera nomiou=sin. o(/ti de\ kai\ *(ippokra/ths 
ou(/tws e)gi/gnwsken *)aristote/lous e)/ti pro/teros w)/n, 
e)n e(te/rois h(mi=n a)pode/deiktai. prw=tos ga\r ou(=tos 
a(pa/ntwn w(=n i)/smen i)atrw=n te kai\ filoso/fwn a)podeiknu/ein e)pexei/rhse te/ttaras 
ei)=nai ta\s pa/sas 
drastika\s ei)s a)llh/las poio/thtas, u(f' w(=n gi/gnetai/ 
te kai\ fqei/retai pa/nq', o(/sa ge/nesi/n te kai\ fqora\n

a)llh/lwn au)ta\s o(/las di' o(/lwn *(ippokra/ths a(pa/ntwn prw=tos e)/gnw: kai\ ta\s 
a)rxa/s ge tw=n a)podei/cewn, w(=n u(/steron *)aristote/lhs metexeiri/sato, 
par' e)kei/nw| prw/tw| gegramme/nas e)/stin eu(rei=n.

ei) d' w(/sper ta\s poio/thtas ou(/tw kai\ ta\s ou)si/as 
di' o(/lwn kera/nnusqai xrh\ nomi/zein, w(s u(/steron 
a)pefh/nato *zh/nwn o( *kittieu/s, ou)x h(gou=mai dei=n 
e)/ti peri\ tou/tou kata\ to/nde to\n lo/gon e)pecie/nai. 
mo/nhn ga\r ei)s ta\ paro/nta de/omai gignw/skesqai 
 
th\n di' o(/lhs th=s ou)si/as a)lloi/wsin, i(/na mh/ tis 
o)stou= kai\ sarko\s kai\ neu/rou kai\ tw=n a)/llwn 
e(ka/stou mori/wn oi(onei\ misga/gkeia/n tina tw=| a)/rtw| 
 
nomi/sh| perie/xesqai ka)/peit' e)n tw=| sw/mati diakrino/menon w(s to\ o(mo/fulon 
e(/kaston i)e/nai. kai/toi 
pro/ ge th=s diakri/sews ai(=ma fai/netai gigno/menos 
o( pa=s a)/rtos. ei) gou=n pampo/llw| tis xro/nw| mhde\n 
a)/ll' ei)/h siti/on prosfero/menos, ou)de\n h(=tton e)n 
tai=s fleyi\n ai(=ma periexo/menon e(/cei. kai\ fanerw=s 
tou=to th\n tw=n a)meta/blhta ta\ stoixei=a tiqeme/nwn 
e)cele/gxei do/can, w(/sper oi)=mai kai\ tou)/laion ei)s 
th\n tou= lu/xnou flo/ga katanalisko/menon a(/pan

p:
kai/toi to/ g' a)ntile/gein au)toi=s h)rnhsa/mhn, a)ll' 
e)pei\ th=s i)atrikh=s u(/lhs h)=n to\ para/deigma kai\ 
xrh/|zw pro\s to\n paro/nta lo/gon au)tou=, dia\ tou=t' 
e)mnhmo/neusa. katalipo/ntes ou)=n, w(s e)/fhn, th\n

p.#text:
to\n e)fech=s lo/gon a(/panta poihso/meqa zhtou=ntes 
u(pe\r w(=n e)c a)rxh=s prou)qe/meqa, po/sai te kai\ ti/nes 
ei)si\n ai( th=s fu/sews duna/meis kai\ ti/ poiei=n e)/rgon 
 
e(ka/sth pe/fuken. e)/rgon de\ dhlono/ti kalw= to\ 
 
gegono\s h)/dh kai\ sumpeplhrwme/non u(po\ th=s e)nergei/as au)tw=n, oi(=on to\ ai(=ma, th\n sa/rka, to\ neu=ron: 
e)ne/rgeian de\ th\n drastikh\n o)noma/zw ki/nhsin kai\ 
th\n tau/ths ai)ti/an du/namin. e)pei\ ga\r e)n tw=| to\ 
siti/on ai(=ma gi/gnesqai paqhtikh\ me\n h( tou= siti/ou, 
drastikh\ d' h( th=s flebo\s gi/gnetai ki/nhsis, w(sau/tws de\ ka)n tw=| metafe/rein 
ta\ kw=la kinei= me\n o( 
mu=s, kinei=tai de\ ta\ o)sta=, th\n me\n th=s flebo\s kai\ 
tw=n muw=n ki/nhsin e)ne/rgeian ei)=nai/ fhmi, th\n de\ 
tw=n siti/wn te kai\ tw=n o)stw=n su/mptwma/ te kai\

th\n me\n ou)=n e)ne/rgeian e)gxwrei= kalei=n kai\ e)/rgon 
th=s fu/sews, oi(=on th\n pe/yin, th\n a)na/dosin, th\n 
ai(ma/twsin, ou) mh\n to/ g' e)/rgon e)c a(/pantos e)ne/rgeian: h( ga/r toi sa\rc e)/rgon me/n e)sti th=s fu/sews, 
ou) mh\n e)ne/rgeia/ ge. dh=lon ou)=n, w(s qa/teron me\n 
tw=n o)noma/twn dixw=s le/getai, qa/teron d' ou)/.

e)moi\ me\n ou)=n kai\ h( fle\y kai\ tw=n a)/llwn 
a(pa/ntwn e(/kaston dia\ th\n e)k tw=n tetta/rwn poia\n 
 
kra=sin w(di/ pws e)nergei=n dokei=. ei)si\ de/ ge mh\n ou)k 
 
o)li/goi tine\s a)/ndres ou)d' a)/docoi, filo/sofoi/ te 
kai\ i)atroi/, tw=| me\n qermw=| kai\ tw=| yuxrw=| to\ dra=n

tau/tas a)na/gein peira=tai ta\s a)rxa/s, h)kolou/qhse 
d' u(/steron au)tw=| kai\ o( a)po\ th=s stoa=s xoro/s. kai/toi tou/tois me/n, w(s a)\n kai\ au)tw=n tw=n stoixei/wn 
th\n ei)s a)/llhla metabolh\n xu/sesi/ te/ tisi kai\ 
pilh/sesin a)nafe/rousin, eu)/logon h)=n a)rxa\s drastika\s poih/sasqai to\ qermo\n kai\ to\ yuxro/n,

be/ltion h)=n kai\ ta\s tw=n kata\ me/ros ai)ti/as a(pa/sas 
ei)s tau/tas a)na/gein. ti/ dh/pot' ou)=n e)n me\n toi=s peri\

toi=s metewrologikoi=s kai\ toi=s problh/masi kai\ 
a)/lloqi pollaxo/qi tai=s du/o mo/nais; ei) me\n ga\r 
w(s e)n toi=s zw|/ois te kai\ toi=s futoi=s ma=llon me\n 
dra=| to\ qermo\n kai\ to\ yuxro/n, h(=tton de\ to\ zhro\n

to\n *(ippokra/thn su/myhfon: ei) d' w(sau/tws e)n 
 
a(/pasin, ou)ke/t' oi)=mai sugxwrh/sein tou=to mh\ o(/ti 
to\n *(ippokra/thn a)lla\ mhd' au)to\n to\n *)aristote/lhn memnh=sqai/ ge boulo/menon w(=n e)n toi=s peri\ 
gene/sews kai\ fqora=s ou)x a(plw=s a)lla\ met' a)podei/cews au)to\s h(ma=s e)di/dacen. a)lla\ peri\ me\n 
tou/twn ka)n toi=s peri\ kra/sewn, ei)s o(/son i)atrw=| 
xrh/simon, e)peskeya/meqa.

h( d' ou)=n du/namis h( e)n tai=s fleyi\n h( ai(matopoihtikh\ prosagoreuome/nh kai\ pa=sa d' a)/llh 
du/namis e)n tw=| pro/s ti neno/htai: prw/tws me\n 
ga\r th=s e)nergei/as ai)ti/a, h)/dh de\ kai\ tou= e)/rgou

ti, tou= ga\r u(p' au)th=s genome/nou mo/nou, tw=n d' 
a)/llwn ou)deno/s, eu)/dhlon, o(/ti kai\ h( du/namis e)n tw=|

th=s e)nergou/shs ai)ti/as, du/namin au)th\n o)noma/zomen, 
ei)=nai/ tina le/gontes e)n tai=s fleyi\n ai(matopoihtikh/n, w(sau/tws de\ ka)n th=| koili/a| peptikh\n ka)n th=| 
kardi/a| sfugmikh\n kai\ kaq' e(/kaston tw=n a)/llwn 
 
i)di/an tina\ th=s kata\ to\ mo/rion e)nergei/as. ei)/per 
ou)=n meqo/dw| me/lloimen e)ceurh/sein, o(po/sai te kai\

e)nergei/as gi/gnetai kai\ tou/twn e(ka/sths prohgei=tai/ 
tis ai)ti/a.

a(plh= tis e)ne/rgeia th=s fu/sews, a)ll' e)c a)lloiw/sew/s te kai\ diapla/sew/s e)sti su/nqetos. i(/na me\n

e)ce/lh|s e(ka/stou tw=n ei)rhme/nwn ta\s a)rthri/as te

h)\ o)cw/dh keklh/kasin au)to/n, o(/ti kai\ drimu\s o(moi/ws

a(/ma kai\ yu/xein pe/fuken.

 u(pomnhma/twn. o(/son ou)=n e)mfe/retai tai=s fleyi\

e)sxhkui=a/n ti xrhsto\n h)/dh kai\ au)th\n e)k th=s pro\s

mh\ ou)k h)/toi pa/sxein q' a(/ma kai\ dra=n h)\ qa/teron

i)sa/zh| tai=s duna/mesin, e)c i)/sou dra/sei te kai\ 
pei/setai, a)\n d' u(pere/xh| polu\ kai\ krath=| qa/teron,

ou)/koun e)nde/xetai trofh\n me\n ei)=nai/ ti tw=| zw|/w|

po/son ou)=n e)stin, o(\ a)lloioi=, kai\ dh\ qeasw/meqa:

sarko\s a)pome/maktai poio/thtas. e)/nesti de/ soi

fle/gma touti\ to\ kata\ to\ sto/ma kai\ leixh/nwn 
e)sti\n a)/kos kai\ skorpi/ous a)nairei= paraxrh=ma kai\

a)ll' o(/son ta\ memashme/na tou/twn e)pi\ ple/on

pw=s d' a)\n h)du/nato *r(a|di/ws ai(matou=sqai mh\

g' oi)kei/an tw=| tou= zw|/ou sw/mati; makrw=| tou=t'

p.#text:
kai\ mh\n du/o xitw=nas h( gasth\r e)/xei pa/ntws

o( me\n e)/ndon eu)qei/as e)/xei ta\s i)=nas, o(lkh=s ga\r 
 
e(/neka ge/gonen: o( d' e)/cwqen e)gkarsi/as u(pe\r tou=

tw=n i)nw=n qe/seis ai( kinh/seis ei)si/n. e)p' au)tw=n de\

e(ka/stw| me\n tw=n e)nte/rwn stroggu/lai kaq' e(ka/teron tw=n xitw/nwn ai( i)=ne/s ei)si: periste/llontai 
ga\r mo/non, e(/lkousi d' ou)de/n. h( gasth\r de\ tw=n 
i)nw=n ta\s me\n eu)qei/as e)/xei xa/rin o(lkh=s, ta\s d'

e)gkarsi/wn i)nw=n teinome/nwn e)/latton a)na/gkh gi/gnesqai 
 
to\ eu)=ros th=s periexome/nhs u(p' au)tw=n 
koilo/thtos, tw=n d' eu)qeiw=n e(lkome/nwn te kai\ ei)s 
e(auta\s sunagome/nwn ou)k e)nde/xetai mh\ ou)  
sunairei=sqai to\ mh=kos. a)lla\ mh\n e)nargw=s ge fai/netai

la/rugc a)natre/xwn, o(/son o( sto/maxos kataspa=tai, kai\ o(/tan ge sumplhrwqei/shs th=s e)n tw=|

to\n la/rugga.

o(/ti d' ai( periferei=s i)=nes, ai(=s periste/lletai

*)erasi/stratos ei)=pe, tou=to mo/non au)to\  
sumbh/setai to\ tw=n a)/nw sustellome/nwn diaste/llesqai ta\ ka/tw. tou=to d' o(/ti, ka)\n ei)s nekrou= to\n

ou)dei\s a)gnoei=. tai=s ga\r tw=n u(lw=n dia\ stenou= 
 
sw/matos o(doipori/ais a)ko/louqo/n e)sti to\ su/mptwma: qaumasto\n ga/r, ei) dierxome/nou tino\s

koino/n e)sti kai\ toi=s nekroi=s sw/masi, di' w(=n

e)mei=tai de\ qate/rou mo/nou tou= e)/cwqen e)nergou=ntos,

e)piqumei= ti tw=n kata\ to\ sto/ma mori/wn tou= gignome/nou paqh/matos, a)ll' a)/mfw th=s gastro\s au)th=s 
ei)sin e)nanti/ai diaqe/seis, o)regome/nhs me\n kai\

kai\ to\ katapi/nein au)to\ toi=s me\n i(kanw=s o)regome/nois tw=n oi)kei/wn e)desma/twn th=| gastri\ ta/xista 
gi/gnetai, safw=s e(lkou/shs au)ta\ kai\ kataspw/shs 
pri\n h)\ mashqh=nai, toi=s d' h)/toi fa/rmako/n ti kat' 
 
a)na/gkhn pi/nousin h)\ siti/on e)n xw/ra| farma/kou 
prosferome/nois a)niara\ kai\ mo/gis h( kata/posis 
au)tw=n e)pitelei=tai.

dh=los ou)=n e)stin e)k tw=n ei)rhme/nwn o( me\n e)/ndon 
xitw\n th=s gastro\s o( ta\s eu)qei/as e)/xwn i)=nas th=s 
e)k tou= sto/matos ei)s au)th\n o(lkh=s e(/neka gegonw\s 
kai\ dia\ tou=t' e)n tai=s katapo/sesi mo/nais e)nergw=n, 
o( d' e)/cwqen o( ta\s e)gkarsi/as e)/xwn e(/neka me\n tou= 
periste/llesqai toi=s e)nupa/rxousi kai\ prowqei=n 
au)ta\ toiou=tos a)potelesqei/s, e)nergw=n d' ou)de\n 
h(=tton e)n toi=s e)me/tois h)\ tai=s katapo/sesin. e)narge/stata de\ marturei= tw=| legome/nw| kai\ to\ kata\ 
ta\s xa/nnas te kai\ tou\s suno/dontas gigno/menon: 
eu(ri/sketai ga\r e)ni/ote tou/twn h( gasth\r e)n tw=| 
sto/mati kaqa/per kai\ o( *)aristote/lhs e)n tai=s peri\ 
 
zw|/wn e)/grayen i(stori/ais kai\ prosti/qhsi/ ge th\n 
ai)ti/an u(po\ laimargi/as au)toi=s tou=to sumbai/nein 
fa/skwn.

e)/xei ga\r w(=de: kata\ ta\s sfodrote/ras o)re/ceis 
a)/nw prostre/xei pa=si toi=s zw|/ois h( gasth/r, w(/ste 
tine\s tou= pa/qous ai)/sqhsin e)nargh= sxo/ntes 
e)ce/rpein au(toi=s fasi th\n koili/an, e)ni/wn de\  
maswme/nwn e)/ti kai\ mh/pw kalw=s e)n tw=| sto/mati 
ta\ siti/a katergasame/nwn e)carpa/zei fanerw=s 
a)ko/ntwn. e)f' w(=n ou)=n zw|/wn fu/sei laima/rgwn 
u(parxo/ntwn h(/ t' eu)ruxwri/a tou= sto/mato/s e)sti 
dayilh\s h(/ te th=s gastro\s qe/sis e)ggu/s, w(s e)pi\ 
suno/donto/s te kai\ xa/nnhs, ou)de\n qaumasto/n, o(/tan 
i(kanw=s peina/santa diw/kh| ti tw=n mikrote/rwn 
zw|/wn, ei)=t' h)/dh plhsi/on h)=| tou= sullabei=n, a)natre/xein e)peigou/shs th=s e)piqumi/as ei)s to\ sto/ma 
th\n gaste/ra. gene/sqai d' a)/llws a)mh/xanon tou=to 
mh\ ou)x w(/sper dia\ xeiro\s tou= stoma/xou th=s 
gastro\s e)pispwme/nhs ei)s e(auth\n ta\ siti/a. kaqa/per ga\r kai\ h(mei=s u(po\ proqumi/as e)ni/ote th=| xeiri\ 
sunepektei/nomen o(/lous h(ma=s au)tou\s e(/neka tou= 
qa=tton e)pidra/casqai tou= prokeime/nou sw/matos, 
ou(/tw kai\ h( gasth\r oi(=on xeiri\ tw=| stoma/xw| 
sunepektei/netai. kai\ dia\ tou=t' e)f' w(=n zw|/wn a(/ma 
ta\ tri/a tauti\ sune/pesen, e)/fesi/s te sfodra\ th=s 
trofh=s o(/ te sto/maxos mikro\s h(/ t' eu)ruxwri/a tou= 
sto/matos dayilh/s, e)pi\ tou/twn o)li/gh *r(oph\ th=s 
e)pekta/sews ei)s to\ sto/ma th\n koili/an o(/lhn a)nafe/rei.

h)/rkei me\n ou)=n i)/sws a)ndri\ fusikw=| par' au)th=s 
 
mo/nhs th=s kataskeuh=s tw=n o)rga/nwn th\n e)/ndeicin 
th=s e)nergei/as lamba/nein. ou) ga\r dh\ ma/thn g' 
 
a)\n h( fu/sis e)k duoi=n xitw/nwn e)nanti/ws a)llh/lois 
e)xo/ntwn a)peirga/sato to\n oi)sofa/gon, ei) mh\ kai\ 
diafo/rws e(ka/teros au)tw=n e)nergei=n e)/mellen. a)ll' 
e)pei\ pa/nta ma=llon h)\ ta\ th=s fu/sews e)/rga diagignw/skein oi( peri\ to\n *)erasi/strato/n ei)sin 
i(kanoi/, fe/re ka)k th=s tw=n zw|/wn a)natomh=s e)pidei/cwmen au)toi=s, w(s e(ka/teros tw=n xitw/nwn e)nergei= 
th\n ei)rhme/nhn e)ne/rgeian. ei) dh/ ti labw\n zw=|on, 
ei)=ta gumnw/sas au)tou= ta\ perikei/mena tw=| stoma/xw| 
sw/mata xwri\s tou= diatemei=n tina tw=n neu/rwn h)\ 
tw=n a)rthriw=n h)\ tw=n flebw=n tw=n au)to/qi tetagme/nwn e)qe/lois a)po\ th=s ge/nuos e(/ws tou= qw/rakos 
eu)qei/ais tomai=s dielei=n to\n e)/cw xitw=na to\n ta\s 
e)gkarsi/as i)=nas e)/xonta ka)/peita tw=| zw|/w| trofh\n 
prosene/gkois, o)/yei katapi=non au)to\ kai/toi th=s 
peristaltikh=s e)nergei/as a)polwlui/as. ei) d' au)= 
pa/lin e)f' e(te/rou zw|/ou diate/mois a)mfote/rous tou\s 
xitw=nas tomai=s e)gkarsi/ais, qea/sh| kai\ tou=to 
katapi=non ou)ke/t' e)nergou=ntos tou= e)nto/s. w(=| dh=lon, 
o(/ti kai\ dia\ qate/rou me\n au)tw=n katapi/nein oi(=o/n 
 
t' e)sti/n, a)lla\ xei=ron h)\ di' a)mfote/rwn. pro\s 
ga\r au)= toi=s a)/llois kai\ tou=t' e)/sti qea/sasqai 
safw=s e)pi\ th=s ei)rhme/nhs a)natomh=s, w(s e)n tw=| 
katapi/nein u(popi/mplatai pneu/matos o( sto/maxos 
tou= sugkatapinome/nou toi=s siti/ois, o(\ peristellome/nou me\n tou= e)/cwqen xitw=nos w)qei=tai *r(adi/ws 
ei)s th\n gaste/ra su\n toi=s e)de/smasi, mo/nou de\ tou= 
e)/ndon u(pa/rxontos e)mpodw\n i(/statai th=| fora=| tw=n 
 
siti/wn diatei=no/n t' au)to\n kai\ th\n e)ne/rgeian 
e)mpodi/zon.

a)ll' ou)/te tou/twn ou)de\n *)erasi/stratos ei)=pen 
ou)/q' w(s h( skolia\ qe/sis tou= stoma/xou diaba/llei 
safw=s to\ do/gma tw=n nomizo/ntwn u(po\ th=s a)/nwqen 
bolh=s mo/nhs podhgou/mena me/xri th=s gastro\s 
i)e/nai ta\ katapino/mena. mo/non d' o(/ti polla\ tw=n 
makrotraxh/lwn zw|/wn e)pikekufo/ta katapi/nei, 
kalw=s ei)=pen. w(=| dh=lon, o(/ti to\ faino/menon ou) 
to\ pw=s katapi/nomen a)podei/knusin, a)lla\ to\ pw=s 
ou) katapi/nomen: o(/ti ga\r mh\ dia\ mo/nhs th=s a)/nwqen 
bolh=s, e)k tou/tou dh=lon: ou) mh\n ei)/q' e(lkou/shs 
th=s koili/as ei)/te para/gontos au)ta\ tou= stoma/xou, 
 
dh=lon h)/dh pw. a)ll' h(mei=s ge pa/ntas tou\s 
logismou\s ei)po/ntes tou/s t' e)k th=s kataskeuh=s 
tw=n o)rga/nwn o(rmwme/nous kai\ tou\s a)po\ tw=n a)/llwn 
sumptwma/twn tw=n te pro\ tou= gumnwqh=nai to\n 
sto/maxon kai\ gumnwqe/ntos, w(s o)li/gw| pro/sqen 
e)le/gomen, i(kanw=s e)nedeica/meqa tou= me\n e(/lkein 
e(/neka to\n e)nto\s xitw=na, tou= d' a)pwqei=n to\n e)kto\s 
gegone/nai.

 ou)=n a)podei=cai th
 kaqektikh
 
du/namin e)n e(ka/stw| tw=n o)rga/nwn ou)=san, w(/sper

p.#text:
ou)/koun e)/t' a)porh/somen ou)de\ peri\ tou= splhno/s, 
ei) e(/lkei me\n to\ oi)kei=on, a)pokri/nei de\ to\ a)llo/trion, 
a)lloiou=n de\ kai\ kate/xein, o(/son a)\n e)pispa/shtai, 
pe/fuken, ou)de\ peri\ h(/patos h)\ flebo\s h)\ a)rthri/as 
 
h)\ kardi/as h)\ tw=n a)/llwn tino/s: a)nagkai=ai ga\r 
e)dei/xqhsan ai( te/ttares au(=tai duna/meis a(/panti 
mori/w| tw=| me/llonti qre/yesqai kai\ dia\ tou=t' au)ta\s 
u(phre/tidas ei)=nai qre/yews e)/famen: w(s ga\r to\ tw=n 
a)nqrw/pwn a)popa/thma toi=s kusi\n h(/diston, ou(/tw 
kai\ ta\ tou= h(/patos perittw/mata to\ me\n tw=| 
splhni/, to\ de\ th=| xolhdo/xw| ku/stei, to\ de\ toi=s 
nefroi=s oi)kei=on.

p:
kai\ le/gein e)/ti peri\ th=s tou/twn gene/sews ou)k 
a)\n e)qe/loimi meq' *(ippokra/thn kai\ *pla/twna kai\ 
*)aristote/lhn kai\ *diokle/a kai\ *pracago/ran kai\ 
*filo/timon: ou)de\ ga\r ou)de\ peri\ tw=n duna/mewn 
ei)=pon a)/n, ei)/ tis tw=n e)/mprosqen a)kribw=s e)ceirga/sato to\n u(pe\r au)tw=n lo/gon.

p.#text:
e)pei\ d' oi( me\n palaioi\ kalw=s u(pe\r au)tw=n 
a)pofhna/menoi pare/lipon a)gwni/sasqai tw=| lo/gw|, 
mhd' u(ponoh/santes e)/sesqai/ tinas ei)s tosou=ton 
a)naisxu/ntous sofista/s, w(s a)ntile/gein e)pixeirh=sai toi=s e)narge/sin, oi( new/teroi de\ to\ me/n ti 
 
nikhqe/ntes u(po\ tw=n sofisma/twn e)pei/sqhsan 
au)toi=s, to\ de/ ti kai\ a)ntile/gein e)pixeirh/santes

duna/mews, dia\ tou=q', w(s a)\n e)kei/nwn au)tw=n, ei)/per e)/t' 
h)=n tis, a)gwni/sasqai/ moi dokei= pro\s tou\s a)natre/pontas th=s te/xnhs ta\ ka/llista, kai\ au)to\s ou(/tws 
e)peira/qhn sunqei=nai tou\s lo/gous.

p:
o(/ti d' h)\ ou)de\n h)\ panta/pasin a)nu/sw ti smikro/n, ou)k a)gnow=: pa/mpolla ga\r eu(ri/skw tele/ws 
me\n a)podedeigme/na toi=s palaioi=s, ou)/te de\ suneta\ 
toi=s polloi=s tw=n nu=n di' a)maqi/an a)ll' ou)d' 
e)pixeirou/mena gignw/skesqai dia\ *r(a|qumi/an, ou)/t', 
ei) kai\ gnwsqei/h tini/, dikai/ws e)cetazo/mena.

p.#text:
xrh\ ga\r to\n me/llonta gnw/sesqai/ ti tw=n pollw=n a)/meinon eu)qu\s me\n kai\ th=| 
fu/sei kai\ th=| prw/th| 
didaskali/a| polu\ tw=n a)/llwn dienegkei=n: e)peida\n 
de\ ge/nhtai meira/kion, a)lhqei/as tina\ sxei=n e)rwtikh\n mani/an, w(/sper e)nqousiw=nta 
kai\ mh/q' h(me/ras 
mh/te nukto\s dialei/pein speu/donta/ te kai\ suntetame/non e)kmaqei=n, o(/sa toi=s e)ndocota/tois ei)/rhtai 
tw=n palaiw=n: e)peida\n d' e)kma/qh|, kri/nein au)ta\ 
kai\ basani/zein xro/nw| pampo/llw| kai\ skopei=n, 
po/sa me\n o(mologei= toi=s e)nargw=s fainome/nois, 
 
po/sa de\ diafe/retai, kai\ ou(/tw ta\ me\n ai(rei=sqai, 
ta\ d' a)postre/fesqai. tw=| me\n dh\ toiou/tw| pa/nu 
sfo/dra xrhsi/mous h)/lpika tou\s h(mete/rous e)/sesqai 
 
lo/gous: ei)=en d' a)\n o)li/goi panta/pasin ou(=toi: 
toi=s d' a)/llois ou(/tw genh/setai to\ gra/mma peritto/n, w(s ei) kai\ mu=qon o)/nw| tis le/goi.

p:
*sumperante/on ou)=n h(mi=n to\n lo/gon e(/neka tw=n 
th=s a)lhqei/as e)fieme/nwn o(/sa lei/pei kat' au)to\n 
e)/ti prosqei=sin. w(s ga\r h( gasth\r e(/lkei me\n 
e)nargw=s kai\ kataspa=| ta\ siti/a toi=s sfo/dra 
peinw/desi, pri\n a)kribw=s e)n tw=| sto/mati leiwqh=nai, dusxerai/nei de\ kai\ 
a)pwqei=tai toi=s a)posi/tois te kai\ pro\s a)na/gkhn e)sqi/ousin, ou(/tw kai\ 
tw=n a)/llwn o)rga/nwn e(/kaston a)mfote/ras e)/xei ta\s 
duna/meis, th/n te tw=n oi)kei/wn e(lktikh\n kai\ th\n 
tw=n a)llotri/wn a)pokritikh/n. kai\ dia\ tou=to, ka)\n 
e)c e(no\s h)=| xitw=nos o)/rgano/n ti sunestw/s, w(/sper 
kai\ ai( ku/steis a)mfo/terai kai\ ai( mh=trai kai\ ai( 
fle/bes, a)mfo/tera tw=n i)nw=n e)/xei ta\ ge/nh, tw=n 
eu)qeiw=n te kai\ tw=n e)gkarsi/wn.

p.#text:
*kai\ me/n ge kai\ tri/ton ti ge/nos i)nw=n e)sti 
tw=n locw=n, e)/latton polu\ tw=| plh/qei tw=n 
proeirhme/nwn du/o genw=n. eu(ri/sketai d' e)n me\n 
toi=s e)k duoi=n xitw/nwn sunesthko/sin o)rga/nois 
e)n qate/rw| mo/nw| tai=s eu)qei/ais i)si\n a)namemigme/non, 
e)n de\ toi=s e)c e(no\s a(/ma toi=s a)/llois du/o ge/nesi. 
sunepilamba/nousi d' au(=tai me/giston th=| th=s kaqektikh=s o)nomasqei/shs duna/mews e)nergei/a|: dei=tai 
ga\r e)n tou/tw| tw=| xro/nw| pantaxo/qen e)sfi/gxqai 
kai\ periteta/sqai toi=s e)nupa/rxousi to\ mo/rion, h( 
 
me\n gasth\r e)n tw=| th=s pe/yews, ai( mh=trai d' e)n 
tw=| th=s kuh/sews xro/nw| panti/.

tau=t' a)/ra kai\ o( th=s flebo\s xitw\n ei(=s w)\n e)k 
polueidw=n i)nw=n e)ge/neto kai\ tw=n th=s a)rthri/as o( 
me\n e)/cwqen e)k tw=n stroggu/lwn, o( d' e)/swqen e)k 
me\n tw=n eu)qeiw=n plei/stwn, o)li/gwn de/ tinwn su\n 
au)tai=s kai\ tw=n locw=n, w(/ste ta\s me\n fle/bas tai=s 
mh/trais kai\ tai=s ku/stesin e)oike/nai kata/ ge th\n 
tw=n i)nw=n su/nqesin, ei) kai\ tw=| pa/xei lei/pontai, 
ta\s d' a)rthri/as th=| gastri/. mo/na de\ pa/ntwn o)rga/nwn e)k duoi=n q' a(/ma kai\ 
a)mfote/rwn e)gkarsi/as 
e)xo/ntwn ta\s i)=nas e)ge/neto ta\ e)/ntera. to\ d' o(/ti 
 
be/ltion h)=n tw=n t' a)/llwn e(ka/stw| toiou/tw| th\n 
fu/sin u(pa/rxein, oi(=o/nper kai\ nu=n e)sti, toi=s t' 
e)nte/rois e)k duoi=n o(moi/wn xitw/nwn sugkei=sqai, th=s 
peri\ xrei/as mori/wn pragmatei/as e)sti/n. ou)/koun 
nu=n xrh\ poqei=n a)kou/ein peri\ tw=n toiou/twn, w(/sper 
ou)de\ dia\ ti/ peri\ tou= plh/qous tw=n xitw/nwn 
e(ka/stou tw=n o)rga/nwn diapefw/nhtai toi=s a)natomikoi=s a)ndra/sin. u(pe\r me\n ga\r 
tou/twn au)ta/rkws 
e)n toi=s peri\ th=s a)natomikh=s diafwni/as ei)/rhtai: 
peri\ de\ tou= dio/ti toiou=ton e(/kaston e)ge/neto tw=n 
o)rga/nwn, e)n toi=s peri\ xrei/as mori/wn ei)rh/setai.

nuni\ d' ou)de/teron tou/twn pro/keitai le/gein, 
a)lla\ ta\s fusika\s duna/meis mo/nas a)podeiknu/ein e)n 
e(ka/stw| tw=n o)rga/nwn te/ttaras u(parxou/sas. e)pi\ 
tou=t' ou)=n pa/lin e)panelqo/ntes a)namnh/swme/n te 
 
tw=n e)/mprosqen ei)rhme/nwn e)piqw=me/n te kefalh\n 
h)/dh tw=| lo/gw| panti\ to\ lei=pon e)/ti prosqe/ntes. 
e)peidh\ ga\r e(/kaston tw=n e)n tw=| zw|/w| mori/wn e(/lkein 
ei)s e(auto\ to\n oi)kei=on xumo\n a)pode/deiktai kai\ 
prw/th sxedo\n au(/th tw=n fusikw=n e)sti duna/mewn, 
 
e)fech=s e)kei/nw| gnwste/on, w(s ou) pro/teron a)potri/betai th\n e(lxqei=san trofh\n 
h)/toi su/mpasan 
h)\ kai/ ti peri/ttwma au)th=s, pri\n a)\n ei)s e)nanti/an 
metape/sh| dia/qesin h)\ au)to\ to\ o)/rganon h)\ kai\ tw=n 
periexome/nwn e)n au)tw=| ta\ plei=sta. h( me\n ou)=n 
gasth/r, e)peida\n me\n i(kanw=s e)mplhsqh=| tw=n siti/wn 
kai\ to\ xrhsto/taton au)tw=n ei)s tou\s e(auth=s xitw=nas e)napo/qhtai bda/llousa, 
thnikau=t' h)/dh to\ 
loipo\n a)potri/betai kaqa/per a)/xqos a)llo/trion: 
ai( ku/steis d', e)peida\n e(/kaston tw=n e(lxqe/ntwn h)\ 
tw=| plh/qei diatei=non h)\ th=| poio/thti da/knon a)niaro\n 
ge/nhtai.

tw=| d' au)tw=| tro/pw| kai\ ai( mh=trai: h)/toi ga/r, 
e)peida\n mhke/ti fe/rwsi diateino/menai, to\ lupou=n 
a)poqe/sqai speu/dousin h)\ th=| poio/thti dakno/menai 
tw=n e)kxuqe/ntwn ei)s au)ta\s u(grw=n. e(ka/teron de\ 
tw=n ei)rhme/nwn gi/gnetai me\n kai\ biai/ws e)/stin o(/te 
kai\ a)mblw/skousi thnikau=ta, gi/gnetai d' w(s ta\ 
polla\ kai\ proshko/ntws, o(/per ou)k a)mblw/skein 
a)ll' a)pokui/+skein te kai\ ti/ktein o)noma/zetai. toi=s 
me\n ou)=n a)mblwqridi/ois farma/kois h)/ tisin a)/llois 
 
paqh/masi diafqei/rousi to\ e)/mbruon h)/ tinas tw=n 
u(me/nwn au)tou= *r(hgnu/ousin ai( a)mblw/seis e(/pontai, 
ou(/tw de\ ka)peida\n a)niaqw=si/ poq' ai( mh=trai kakw=s 
e)/xousai th=| diata/sei, tai=s de\ tw=n e)mbru/wn au)tw=n 
kinh/sesi tai=s sfodrota/tais oi( to/koi, kaqa/per 
kai\ tou=q' *(ippokra/tei kalw=s ei)/rhtai. koino\n d' 
 
a(pasw=n tw=n diaqe/sewn h( a)ni/a kai\ tau/ths ai)/tion 
tritto\n h)\ o)/gkos peritto\s h)/ ti ba/ros h)\ dh=cis: 
o)/gkos me/n, e)peida\n mhke/ti fe/rwsi diateino/menai, 
ba/ros d', e)peida\n u(pe\r th\n *r(w/mhn au)tw=n h)=| to\ 
periexo/menon, dh=cis d', e)peida\n h)/toi ta\ pro/teron 
e)n toi=s u(me/sin u(gra\ stego/mena *r(age/ntwn au)tw=n 
ei)s au)ta\s e)kxuqh=| ta\s mh/tras h)\ kai\ su/mpan 
a)pofqare\n to\ ku/hma shpo/meno/n te kai\ dialuo/menon ei)s moxqhrou\s i)xw=ras ou(/tws e)reqi/zh| te kai\ 
da/knh| to\n xitw=na tw=n u(sterw=n.

a)na/logon ou)=n e)n a(/pasi toi=s o)rga/nois e(/kasta 
tw=n t' e)/rgwn au)tw=n tw=n fusikw=n kai\ me/ntoi tw=n 
paqhma/twn te kai\ noshma/twn fai/netai gigno/mena, ta\ me\n e)nargw=s kai\ safw=s 
ou(/tws, w(s 
a)podei/cews dei=sqai mhde/n, ta\ d' h(=tton me\n

u(lw=n e)nargw=s e)/stin i)dei=n gignome/nas. ei)=t' e)pi\ 
me\n th=s traxei/as a)rthri/as ou)k a)porei=s e)nalla\c 
pote\ me\n ei)/sw paragou/shs ei)s to\n pneu/mona to\

a)porei=s kai/ soi qaumasto\n ei)=nai fai/netai, dia\ 
tw=n au)tw=n a)nadi/dosqai/ q' a(/ma th\n trofh\n ei)s 
h(=par e(/lkesqai/ t' e)c e)kei/nou pa/lin ei)s gaste/ra;

e)pispa=tai. ei) d' o(/ti kaq' e(\n kai\ tau)to\ zw=|on e(\n

tara/ttei, th/n t' ei)spnoh\n i)de\ kai\ th\n e)kpnoh/n. pa/ntws pou kai\ au(=tai dia\ me\n tw=n 
au)tw=n o)rga/nwn 
gi/gnontai, tro/pw| de\ kinh/sew/s te kai\ fora=s tw=n

p:
o( pneu/mwn me\n ou)=n kai\ o( qw/rac kai\ a)rthri/ai

p.#text:
e)/xei ga\r w(=de to\ su/mpan. e(/kaston tw=n o)rga/nwn ei)s e(auto\ th\n plhsia/zousan e)pispa=tai

kai\ meta\ tau=ta prosfu/ei te kai\ o(moioi=, toute/sti tre/fetai. diw/ristai ga\r

e)rga/shtai mori/ois: ou(/tw ga\r a)\n ou)ke/ti fusiko\n 
 
o)/rganon a)lla\ zw=|o/n ti gi/gnoito logismo/n te kai\

a)ll' au(/th me\n me\n periste/lletai tw=| to\ pa=n

e)c au)tw=n u(gro/thtos kai\ koresqei=sa ba/ros h(gei=tai

e)n tou/tw| d' au)= tw=| xro/nw| kai\ toi=s tw=n e)nte/rwn

p:
kai/ moi temw\n h)/dh tw=| logismw=| th\n th=s trofh=s

p.#text:
kata\ de\ th\n tri/thn moi=ran tou= xro/nou tre/fesqai 
 
me\n h)/dh th\n koili/an o(moiw/sasan e(auth=| 
tele/ws ta\ prosfu/nta, pro/sfusin de\ toi=s e)nte/rois kai\ tw=| h(/pati gi/gnesqai tw=n prosteqe/ntwn, 
 
a)na/dosin de\ pa/nth tou= sw/matos kai\ pro/sqesin. 
ei) me\n ou)=n e)pi\ tou/tois eu)qe/ws to\ zw=|on lamba/noi

h(/pati flebw=n e(/lcei th\n trofh/n: ou) ga\r e)c au)tou=

*ou(/tws ou)=n kai\ h( gasth\r e)n w(=| xro/nw| dei=tai

p:
a)lla\ mh\n kai\ w(s e)n e(ka/sth| tw=n a)rthriw=n

p.#text:
ei)/per ou)=n sunqei/hs a)/mfw to/ te tau/thn ei)=nai 
th\n ki/nhsin au)tai=s to/ te pa=n to\ diastello/menon 
 
e(/lkein e)k tw=n plhsi/on ei)s e(auto/, qaumasto\n

th=| pro\s to\ kenou/menon 
a)kolouqi/a| to\ koufo/tato/n te kai\ lepto/taton

e)/cwqen a)e/ra: plhsi/on te ga\r au)tai=s ou(=to/s e)sti

te kai\ ta\ e)/ntera kaqhkousw=n a)rthriw=n th\n

th=s kardi/as au)th=s kai\ tw=n parakeime/nwn au)th=|

a)kolouqi/a| to\ koufo/teron e(/petai pro/teron.

ou)/koun xrh\ qauma/zein, ei) pantelw=s o)li/gon e)k 
th=s koili/as, o(/son a)\n a)kribw=s h)=| kateirgasme/non, 
ei)s ta\s a)rthri/as paragi/gnetai fqanou/sas plhrou=sqai tw=n koufote/rwn, 
a)ll' e)kei=no gignw/skein, 
w(s du/' e)sto\n o(lkh=s ei)/dh, to\ me\n th=| pro\s to\

ei) ou(/tws e)/tuxe, to\ baru/teron, a)\n th=| fu/sei suggene/steron u(pa/rxh|. kai\ toi/nun 
kai\ tai=s a)rthri/ais te kai\ th=| kardi/a|, w(s me\n koi/lois te kai\ 
diaste/llesqai duname/nois o)rga/nois, a)ei\ to\ koufo/teron a)kolouqei= pro/teron, 
w(s de\ tre/fesqai 
deome/nois, ei)s au)tou\s tou\s xitw=nas, oi(\ dh\ ta\

o(/son a)\n ou)=n ei)s th\n koilo/thta diastellome/nwn 
au)tw=n ai(/matos metalhfqh=|, tou/tou to\ oi)keio/tato/n 
 
te kai\ ma/lista tre/fein duna/menon oi( xitw=nes 
au)toi\ tw=n a)ggei/wn e)pispw=ntai.

tou= d' e)k tw=n flebw=n ei)s ta\s a)rthri/as metalamba/nesqai/ ti pro\s toi=s

tou=to/ ge tekmh/rion. ei) polla\s kai\ mega/las 
a)rthri/as diatemw\n a)poktei=nai to\ zw=|on boulhqei/hs, eu(rh/seis au)tou= ta\s

ge ta\ e)/sxata 
pe/rata dunato\n e)/ti qea/sasqai dia/ te smikro/thta 
kai\ o(/ti teqnew=tos h)/dh tou= zw|/ou kate/yuktai/ te 
kai\ pepu/knwtai pa/nta. a)ll' o( lo/gos ka)ntau=qa 
prw=ton me\n e)k tou= mhde\n u(po\ th=s fu/sews

a)nastomw/seis tau/tas tw=n koiliw=n th=s kardi/as: 
ou) ga\r dh\ ei)kh=| ge kai\ w(s e)/tuxen oi( e)s steno\n ou(/tw 
teleutw=ntes e)ge/nonto bo/qunoi.

deu/teron de\ ka)k tou= duoi=n o)/ntoin stoma/toin e)n 
th=| decia=| th=s kardi/as koili/a| tou= me\n ei)sa/gontos 
to\ ai(=ma, tou= d' e)ca/gontos polu\ mei=zon ei)=nai to\
